question: Which of the following best illustrates what is meant by an effective cost trade- off within logistics?

choices.A: Transportation switches from trucking to rail carriers and moving freight in intermodal shipping containers to reduce freight expenses for the firm
choices.B: The adoption of an inventory consolidation strategy where several field distribution warehouses are eliminated resulting in the company holding less inventory and operating fewer warehouses
choices.C: Transportation switches from trucking to more expensive air carriers to transport highly expensive electronics goods resulting in lower inventory carrying cost and overall total cost for the firm
choices.D: A reduction in inventory carrying cost resulting from placing orders more frequently from supplier and a drop in the average inventory levels held by the firm
